item.title: Problem with areas
item.dc:creator: @kakur007 kakur007
item.description:
@kakur007 wrote:

Hey everyone!

I have messed around quite while now with rsc private servers, making it like real rsc with alot updates. But i got stucked in Entrana Cave. I added that area into point area, but when u enter into that cave ur prayer will be drained and i wanted to add that drain. Tryed into gameEngine.java:

[code]for(Player p : world.getPlayers()) {
if(p.getLocation().inEntranaCave()) {
p.addPrayerDrain(10);
p.getActionSender().sendStat(5);

				}
		}[/code]

Added that, its working tho but problem is it drains prayer outside of cave tho. if i login in the cave it will start draining. But it will continue draining outside the cave to, when i relog it stops. Tryed different things with that code but i cant make perfectly working code.
Maybe someone could help me out with this, would really appreaciate that!
Thank you for reading!

-Kakur007

Read full topic
